MemoryInfobox.description: 'Kassandra met a woman named Obelia who was looking for a map leading to lost Minoan civilization|Minoan Submerged Minoan Palace|ruins and their treasures. She needed someone to acquire this map in order to find the treasure.'
MemoryInfobox.concurrent:
A Chest Full of Drachmae
Recruitment Drive
Red in the Wreckage

General_Description: '''We're Not Thieves''' was a virtual representation of one of [[Kassandra]]'s [[Genetic memory|genetic memories]], relived by [[Layla Hassan]] in 2018 through the [[Animus|Portable Animus HR-8.5]].
Section_Description: A woman caught Kassandra's attention and asked her to retrieve a map that would lead to [[Submerged Minoan Palace|sunken treasures]] of a lost civilization.
Section_Dialogue:
While in [[Koressia]], Kassandra heard a woman wailing near the port. *'''[[Obelia]]:''' ''My plans! They're ruined.
How will I find it without the tablet?!
That double-crossing'' malákas''!'' Kassandra approached the woman. *'''Kassandra:''' ''You sound troubled.'' *'''Obelia:''' ''I'm trying to steal [[Xenia]] a great treasure to celebrate her victory over [[Keos]], but the directions have been stolen.'' *'''Kassandra:''' ''And I suppose you want someone to steal them back?'' *'''Obelia:''' ''I tried, but they were stolen by the leader of Koressia, who Xenia banished from the city. There's a new truce between them, and no [[Piracy|pirate]] would touch that.'' *'''Kassandra:''' ''Lucky for you I'm not pirate.'' *'''Obelia:''' ''Are you saying you'll help me? There's something in it for you if you do.'' *'''Kassandra:''' ''I suppose I could get your directions.'' *'''Obelia:''' ''[[Poseidon]] blesses me with good fortune at last!'' *'''Kassandra:''' ''So, where am I going?'' *'''Obelia:''' ''To the other side of the island. You'll find the tablet in the leader's [[Leader House, Pirate Islands|house]] there. Once you have it, head to the nearby Village of [[Poiessa Village|Poieessa]] and deliver it to my associate.'' (If "Where is the house?" is chosen.) *'''Kassandra:''' ''You said the leader's house is near Poieessa?'' *'''Obelia:''' ''Yes. To the south of the village.'' (If "Where is the village?" is chosen.) *'''Kassandra:''' ''Where is Poieessa?'' *'''Obelia:''' ''It's on the east coast of the island of Keos.'' (Leave – "I'll get going.") *'''Kassandra:''' ''Don't worry, I'll get what you want.'' *'''Obelia:''' ''Xenia will be thrilled! I await your return.'' Kassandra headed to the Leader House near the village. She identified the building with [[Ikaros]]' help. *'''Kassandra:''' ''If there is a map, it's in there.'' Kassandra infiltrated the house and found the map. *'''Kassandra:''' ''This must be what she wants.'' Kassandra left the Leader House and approached Poieessa Village. She found Obelia looking over some wares and approached her. *'''Obelia:''' ''This all looks so... boring.'' *'''Kassandra:''' ''What are you doing here?'' *'''Obelia:''' ''Oh, me? I was just... in the area.'' *'''Kassandra:''' ''What happened to your associate?'' *'''Obelia:''' ''He had other business to attend to. Left in a hurry, so I came to meet you.'' *'''Kassandra:''' ''I see.'' *'''Obelia:''' ''Did you get the tablet?'' |-|Here's the tablet.= *'''Kassandra:''' ''I guess I'll be paid handsomely then.'' |-|Pay me first.= *'''Kassandra:''' ''Before I hand over anything, I want my [[drachma]]e.'' *'''Obelia:''' ''But of course. You're a woman after my own heart, you know.'' *'''Kassandra:''' ''Thanks. Here's the tablet.'' *'''Obelia:''' ''Excellent! Now we can really get to the matter at hand. Let's see what we have here.'' Obelia read the tablet. *'''Obelia:''' ''Hmm... This is interesting. The treasure is hidden in some [[Minoan civilization|Minoan]] [[Submerged Minoan Palace|ruins]]... But it's underwater.'' *'''Kassandra:''' ''You can't swim.'' *'''Obelia:''' ''I'm a pirate, course I can fucking swim. I... just don't like [[Great white shark|sharks]].'' *'''Kassandra:''' ''So you're a coward, not a weakling.'' *'''Obelia:''' ''I don't need to swim if I have a reliable [[mercenary]] to do it for me.'' |-|This is beneath me.= |-|I like adventures.= *'''Kassandra:''' ''I might be interested in an adventure.'' *'''Obelia:''' ''I can promise you this will be one to remember, else Poseidon's [[trident]] spear me and drag me to the crushing deep.'' *'''Kassandra:''' ''All right, I suppose I can help you recover your treasure.'' *'''Obelia:''' ''I knew you wouldn't be able to resist! Poseidon blesses me with good fortune at last!'' *'''Kassandra:''' ''So where am I going?'' *'''Obelia:''' ''Here, take this key and head to the southern tip of Keos. You'll find the entrance to the ruins there.'' *'''Kassandra:''' ''It's sticky... is that blood?'' *'''Obelia:''' ''Gods no, must have been the pomegranate I ate earlier. Hurry now, time's a-wastin'.'' (If "What am I looking for?" was chosen.) *'''Kassandra:''' ''What exactly is this treasure?'' *'''Obelia:''' ''It's said to be the [[Ancient Ruins of Kunastros]], so the treasure must be a rare artifact from before the island was settled.'' (If "What can I expect?" was chosen.) *'''Kassandra:''' ''What's it like down there?'' *'''Obelia:''' ''The treasure is guarded by a frenzy of sharks. You'll find it in a chest at the heart of the island.'' *'''Kassandra:''' ''Well if it had been an easy job you'd have done it yourself.'' (If "What are the ruins?" was chosen.) *'''Kassandra:''' ''How will I know if I'm looking in the right place?'' *'''Obelia:''' ''Head south from the [[Lost Garden of Bacchylides]]. Even though the ruins are underwater, you'll see them just off the coast.'' (Leave – "I'll get your treasure.") *'''Kassandra:''' ''I'll get you what you want.''
Section_Outcome: Kassandra helped Obelia recover a tablet leading to an ancient Minoan treasure. In exchange for the tablet, Obelia gave Kassandra a key to an ancient Minoan chest with an artifact worth a great deal of drachmae.
Section_References:
*''[[Assassin's Creed: Odyssey]]''
